results.title: Pulmonary hypertension complicating portal hypertension. A case report with suggestions for a different therapeutic approach.
results.text_hl: The high cardiac output permitted the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@. The pulmonary artery pressure (PAP) was lowered from 105/50 to 87/31 mmHg.

citations.NLM: Boot H, Visser FC, Thijs JC, Meuwissen SG. Pulmonary hypertension complicating portal hypertension. A case report with suggestions for a different therapeutic approach. Eur Heart J. 1987 Jun;8(6):656-60. PMID: 3622546
